turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi I would like to know how much a pizza is?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi I would be happy to help you. Which location would you be picking your food up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Main street in Center City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, sure! A large plain pizza is 14.50. A small is 11.50 and toppings are 1.75 each.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to place an order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I would. I would like a large sausage pizza and a large pepper and onion pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I can place that order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How long do you think it will be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is there a charge for that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok good to know. I think I will pick them up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok I will see you then.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh wait, can I add an order of fries?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large, and a bottle of soda.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok we will see you in 30 minutes then.
